summary: WorldSlayer and DeathBringer are very fun weapons both are craftable, standalone  and enchanted
descriptionHtml:
[size=3.9][font=arial][color=red]Notice that no longer will do more mods because of my work and other circumstances, if anyone wants to continue with this mod, you can do freely, just ask I mention in the credits, thanks[/color][/size][/font]



[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/22442-1-1344987305.jpg[/img]



[size=3]Hi guys, 

WorldSlayer is a mod that has long wanted to do, is very long, so heavy and a little slow but hits harder than a donkey kick 

and has the effect of throwing away your enemy. ItÂ´s really funny!, this is an update fo the mod \"WorldSlayer\", this time with the company of \"DeathBringer\" a light weapon  , super fast and powerful enough both WorldSlayer and DeathBringer are craftable, standalone (is in the daedric zone, but appears when you have the ebony smithing), and both are enchanted[/size]

[size=3,5][color=red]WorldSlayer[/color][/size]

[color=yellow]main power 60
critical 100
weigth 45
speed 5[/color]

[size=3,5][color=red]DeathBringer[/color][/size]

[color=yellow]main power 13
critical 6
weight 7
speed 15[/color]


If you want ot try it open the console and write this code [color=orange]\"help NAMEoftheSWORD 4 \"[/color] then it give us a code, write the code and then write in console \"player.additem\" and the code you wrote just like this [color=limegreen]\"player.additem XXXXXX 1\"[/color]

Comment is to thank my effort

Here is a video

[size=3,5][color=red]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Qj6dvDVC8SM&feature=youtu.be[/color][/size]

author: Micheero
